meanings.definition: A type of recreational equipment used for riding and performing tricks.
meanings.sent1: My brother loves to ride his skateboards at the park.
meanings.sent2: Skateboards come in different colors and designs.
meanings.sent3: The skateboards decided to have a race down the hill for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared like a skateboard in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The sound of skateboards hitting the pavement echoed through the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To ride or perform tricks on a skateboard.
meanings.sent1: I learned how to skateboards last summer.
meanings.sent2: He skateboards to school every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to skateboard on the slippery floor but failed hilariously.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas skateboarded through her mind, searching for the perfect solution.
meanings.sent5: The skateboarded motion of his hands emphasized his excitement.
